body_html:
Check out this thread...

#664

https://gist.github.com/ageitgey/819a51afa4613649bd18

Reportedly, it should work. Unfortunately, I tried it and although I got really close to doing a complete Bazel PIP build, it failed when trying near the end when going through the cuDNN v5 library. I'm not sure if it would work for you, but you should give it a try.

body:
Check out this thread...

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/664

https://gist.github.com/ageitgey/819a51afa4613649bd18

Reportedly, it should work.  Unfortunately, I tried it and although I got really close to doing a complete Bazel PIP build, it failed when trying near the end when going through the cuDNN v5 library. I'm not sure if it would work for you, but you should give it a try.
